headline: New Potomac Edison Substation Brings Improved Reliability to Morgan County Customers
summary: A new substation in Morgan County, West Virginia, is boosting power reliability for nearly 2,000 residents and businesses served by Potomac Edison, a FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE) electric company. Modern features and cutting-edge technology mean fewer and shorter outages for area customers.

content.title: New Potomac Edison Substation Brings Improved Reliability to Morgan County Customers
content.summary: A new substation in Morgan County, West Virginia, is boosting power reliability for nearly 2,000 residents and businesses served by Potomac Edison, a FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE) electric company. Modern features and cutting-edge technology mean fewer and shorter outages for area customers.

thumbnail.caption: The new substation will help keep the lights on for nearly 1,600 customers in the Great Cacapon area of West Virginia and more than 320 customers in Little Orleans, Maryland.

headline: Evaluating FirstEnergy After Shares Rise 14% Ahead of Earnings in 2025
summary: If you are holding FirstEnergy or thinking about adding it to your portfolio, you are not alone in watching their stock movements with curiosity. In a market where steady performance can feel elusive, FirstEnergy has managed to post a 13.9% return year-to-date and a 9.1% increase over the last twelve months, outpacing plenty of its utility peers. The stock is up 2.8% just in the past week and 4.6% over the last month. This is impressive if you are looking for some momentum, especially...

headline: Mon Power/Potomac Edison explore building gas-fired power plant
summary: Oct. 2—dbeard @dominionpost.com MORGANTOWN — FirstEnergy sisters Mon Power and Potomac Edison are exploring having a gas-fired power plant in service by 2031. And the Gas & OI Association of West Virginia is thrilled with the prospect. FirstEnergy first alluded to the possibility of building a gas-fired plant back in March. FirstEnergy President and CEO Brian Tierney said then that it was ...
